about.title: About us
about.us1: At TrackLab, we believe that every shipment matters. We have developed a platform that connects suppliers and customers in an intelligent logistics ecosystem, where every movement is recorded, and every delivery is tracked.
about.us2: We connect processes, people, and packages through intuitive technology, so logistics is no longer a concern and becomes a competitive advantage.

who.title: Who is TrackLab for?
who.subtitle: Our platform is designed for various roles in logistics and transportation companies.

carlos.position: Distribution manager in a transportation company
carlos.description: Carlos coordinates shipments and pickups across multiple routes. He faces challenges when drivers forget to report deliveries, and when products are in transit or delivered.

marcela.description: Marcela oversees the entire company's supply chain. She needs clear, real-time reports to optimize routes and reduce operational costs.

pedro.description: Pedro must validate and document each product receipt. He needs a quick way to confirm deliveries and report inconsistencies.

p&a.title: Problem and Solution
p&a.subtitle: Common Problems
p&a.loss: Loss of products or packages without tracking
p&a.time: Downtime due to lack of traceability
p&a.mistakes: Errors in deliveries or manual documentation
p&a.visibility: Lack of visibility between internal departments
p&a.description: With TrackLab, you centralize your entire logistics operation in an agile, intuitive, and real-time platform. From barcode scanning to automatic reports, AlumWare shows you everything that happens.

benefits.title: Principal benefits
benefits.traceability1: View the status of each shipment, who handled it, and what was delivered.
benefits.confirmation1: The delivery is not complete until the customer confirms it. Everything is recorded.
benefits.dashboard1: Access real-time shipment reports by status, company, or date.
benefits.register1: Create requests with photos, details, and validations directly from the app.
benefits.collaboration1: Both parties can interact and validate processes within the same app.
benefits.history1: Forget about paperwork. Every operation is archived and available whenever you need it.

how.title: How does TrackLab work?
how.step1: Step 1: Register your company and users
how.desc1: Both suppliers and customers register through the app.
how.step2: Step 2: Request or receive a shipment order
how.desc2: The customer creates a request, and the supplying company views it on their dashboard.
how.step3: Step 3: Manage and prepare the shipment
how.desc3: The supplier confirms the order is ready and documents everything digitally.
how.desc4: Once delivered, the customer validates the receipt. Everything is recorded.

questions.q1: 1. What do I need to use the app?
questions.a1: To use our application, you only need a device with internet connection (smartphone, tablet, or computer) and to create a free account. No additional installation is required since it works directly from the web browser.
questions.q2: 2. Can I connect my company with multiple clients or suppliers?
questions.a2: Yes, our platform is designed to allow your company to connect with multiple clients and suppliers simultaneously. You can manage all these relationships from a single control panel, which makes communication and collaboration easier.
questions.q3: 3. Does it integrate with other platforms?
questions.a3: Our application integrates with a wide variety of popular platforms and services, including CRM systems, accounting tools, e-commerce platforms, and more. If you need a specific integration, contact our support team to check availability or request development.
questions.q4: 4. Do you offer support or training?
questions.a4: We offer full technical support through multiple channels (chat, email, and phone) during business hours. Additionally, we provide free training resources such as video tutorials, detailed guides, and regular webinars so you can make the most of all the features of our platform.
